ED_Title: Open-ended working group on reducing space threats through norms, rules and principles of responsible behaviours
ED_DecisionText: At its 69th plenary meeting, on 26 April 2022, the General Assembly, on the proposal of Chile,  (footnote: A/76/L.50) recalling its resolution 76/231 of 24 December 2021, in which it had decided to convene, beginning in 2022, an open-ended working group on reducing space threats through norms, rules and principles of responsible behaviours, noted that the open-ended working group held its organizational session on 7 and 9 February 2022, and decided that the working group shall hold its first session of five days from 9 to 13 May 2022, its second session of five days from 12 to 16 September 2022, its third session of five days from 30 January to 3 February 2023 and its fourth session of five days from 7 to 11 August 2023, unless the working group decided otherwise.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/76/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
